price: Isiniifi wantoota isin Allaah’n ala gabbartaniinis ‘uffi’ (jedheera)! Sila hin xiinxaltanuu?”
arabic: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: uffin lakum walimā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi afalā taʿqilūna
